plus.introduction:
PayPal PLUS: Your complete all-in-one payment solution including PayPal, Direct Debit, Credit Card and Pay Upon Invoice. PayPal PLUS offers your customers full flexibility in choosing their preferred payment method. Your advantages as a seller? Easier accounting with only one contracting party, one account and one transaction overview showing all incoming payments. You receive your money directly after customers complete the order process.
You can apply for PayPal PLUS here. Apply for Payment upon Invoice here.
